TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Window extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl

summary.span: 提供创建、配置、显示和管理窗口和对话框的生存期的能力。

span.span: Provides the ability to create, configure, show, and manage the lifetime of windows and dialog boxes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户和独立的应用程序之间的点是交互的一个窗口。The point of interaction between a user and a standalone application is a window. 一个[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]窗口由两个区域组成：A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window consists of two distinct areas: - 非工作区，其中承载 windows 修饰，包括图标、 标题、 系统菜单中，最小化按钮、 最大化按钮、 还原按钮、 关闭按钮和一个边框。A non-client area, which hosts the windows adornments, including an icon, title, System menu, minimize button, maximize button, restore button, close button, and a border. - 工作区，其中承载应用程序特有的内容。A client area, which hosts application-specific content. 标准窗口如下图中所示：A standard window is shown in the following figure: ![窗口元素](~/add/media/windowoverviewfigure1.PNG "窗口元素")![Window elements](~/add/media/windowoverviewfigure1.PNG "Window elements") 封装创建、 配置、 显示，并管理的窗口和对话框生存期的能力，并提供以下关键服务： encapsulates the ability to create, configure, show, and manage the lifetime of both windows and dialog boxes, and provides the following key services: **生存期管理**: ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， 。**Lifetime Management**: , , , , , , , , , . **窗口管理**: ， ， 。**Window Management**: , , . **外观和行为**: ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，, , , , , , **Appearance and Behavior**: , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , **对话框**: ， 。**Dialog Boxes**: , . 此外，公开对管理的所有应用程序中窗口的特殊支持：Additionally, exposes special support for managing all of the windows in an application: - 应用程序维护当前应用程序中实例化的所有窗口的列表。Application maintains a list of all the windows that are currently instantiated in the application. 此列表由属性。This list is exposed by the property. - 默认情况下自动设置第一个引用的应用程序中实例化。By default, is automatically set with a reference to the first that is instantiated in an application. 这从而使应用程序主窗口的窗口。This thereby making the window the main application window. 一个可以使用标记、 标记和代码隐藏中或代码来实现。A can be implemented using markup, markup and code-behind, or code. 主要用于显示窗口和对话框对于独立应用程序。 is primarily used to display windows and dialog boxes for standalone applications. 但是，需要在窗口级，例如向导中，导航的应用程序可以使用相反;派生自并将其扩展浏览器样式导航支持。However, for applications that require navigation at the window level, such as wizards, you can use instead; derives from and extends it with browser-style navigation support. > [!NOTE] > 可导航内容岛可以合并到使用其他内容和内容容器。Islands of navigable content can be incorporated into other content and content containers using . 需要`UnmanagedCode`用于实例化的安全权限。 needs `UnmanagedCode` security permission to be instantiated. 这会产生以下影响：This has the following consequences: - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clickonce](~/includes/tlasharptla-clickonce-md.md)]-已部署的独立应用程序将请求权限提升时从 Internet 或本地 Intranet 区域启动。-deployed standalone applications will request permission elevation when launched from either the Internet or Local Intranet zones. - [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] 该请求的任何内容不会早于完全权限将不能实例化窗口或对话框。that request anything less than full permissions will not be able to instantiate windows or dialog boxes. 有关独立应用程序部署和安全注意事项的信息，请参阅[WPF 安全策略-平台安全性](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-security-strategy-platform-security.md)。For information about standalone application deployment and security considerations, see [WPF Security Strategy - Platform Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-security-strategy-platform-security.md). 一个是，这意味着它可以包含任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或一个面板） 的单个对象。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 此外，是根元素，因此，不能是另一个元素的内容的一部分。Also, is a root element and, therefore, cannot be part of another element's content. > [!NOTE] > ， ， ，和属性上设置通过 style 将不会应用在运行时。The , , , and properties set on a through a style will not be applied at run time. ## 自定义窗口控件Customizing the Window Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用到多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 可以修改默认为控件提供唯一外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和状态的特定于，请参阅[Window 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/window-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Window Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/window-styles-and-templates.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > Visual 属性设置才会影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并使用设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在中的"更改可视结构控制"部分中找到的视觉对象属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例显示了一个标准的窗口的方式定义仅使用标记：The following example shows how a standard window is defined using only markup: [!code-xaml[WindowSnippets#WindowMARKUPONLY](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowSnippets/CSharp/MarkupOnlyWindow.xaml#windowmarkuponly)] 下面的示例演示如何使用定义的标准窗口只代码：The following example shows how a standard window is defined using only code: [!code-csharp[WindowSnippets#WindowCODEONLY](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowSnippets/CSharp/CodeOnlyWindow.cs#windowcodeonly)] [!code-vb[WindowSnippets#WindowCODEONLY](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowSnippets/visualbasic/codeonlywindow.vb#windowcodeonly)] 下面的示例显示了一个标准的窗口的方式使用标记和代码隐藏的组合来定义。The following example shows how a standard window is defined using a combination of markup and code-behind. [!code-xaml[WindowSnippets#WindowXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml#windowxaml)] [!code-csharp[WindowSnippets#WindowCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#windowcodebehind)] [!code-vb[WindowSnippets#WindowCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#windowcodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 激活窗口 （成为前台窗口） 时：A window is activated (becomes the foreground window) when: - 第一次打开窗口。The window is first opened. - 用户通过使用鼠标，按 ALT + TAB，或从任务管理器中选择其切换到该窗口。A user switches to a window by selecting it with the mouse, pressing ALT+TAB, or from Task Manager. - 用户单击窗口的任务栏按钮。A user clicks the window's taskbar button. Windows 需要检测何时变成活动可以处理事件。Windows that need to detect when they become activate can handle the event. 第一次激活窗口后，它可能会停用并在其生存期中多次重新激活。After a window is first activated, it may be deactivated and reactivated many times during its lifetime. 如果应用程序的行为或状态取决于其激活状态，它可以检查以确定它处于哪个激活状态。If an application's behavior or state depends on its activation state, it can inspect to determine which activation state it's in. 应用程序也可以是。An application can also be .

summary.span: 手动关闭 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个可以使用多个，其中一个已关闭的已知、 系统提供的机制位于其标题栏，其中包括：A can be closed using one of several, well-known, system-provided mechanisms located in its title bar, including: - ALT + F4。ALT+F4. - 系统菜单|**关闭**。System menu | **Close**. - **关闭**按钮。**Close** button. 一个还可以使用多个的已知机制之一的客户端区域中提供的开发人员，包括关闭：A can also be closed using one of several well-known mechanisms within the client area that are provided by developers, including: - **文件** | **退出**主窗口上。**File** | **Exit** on a main window. - **文件** | **关闭**或**关闭**上的子窗口按钮。**File** | **Close** or a **Close** button on a child window. > [!NOTE] > **确定**并**取消**出现在对话框中的按钮也属于提供开发人员，尽管将可能集，这会自动关闭已通过调用打开的窗口。**OK** and **Cancel** buttons on a dialog box are also developer-provided, although will likely set , which automatically closes a window that was opened by calling . 这些机制需要显式调用关闭窗口。These mechanisms require you to explicitly call to close a window. > [!NOTE] > 通过调用打开一个窗口，如果，并使用使用其属性设置为 true，将自动关闭，或者单击该按钮，或按下 esc 键时。If a window, opened by calling , and with a with its property set to true, will automatically close when the button is either clicked, or ESC is pressed. 如果使用已打开窗口，但必须是显式调用，例如从事件处理程序。If the window was opened using , however, must be explicitly called, such as from event handler for the . 关闭窗口，则会事件被引发。Closing a window causes the event to be raised. 如果不取消事件，将发生以下情况：If the event isn't canceled, the following occurs: - 已从(如果对象存在)。The is removed from (if an object exists). - 从所有者中删除如果已建立所有者/所拥有关系之前拥有所示和所有者之后已打开。The is removed from the owner if the owner/owned relationship was established before the owned was shown and after the owner was opened. - 引发 事件。The event is raised. - 非托管资源创建的释放。Unmanaged resources created by the are disposed. - 如果调用以显示，返回。If was called to show the , returns. 关闭导致它拥有要关闭所有窗口。Closing a causes any windows that it owns to be closed. 此外，关闭可能会导致应用程序停止正在运行的具体取决于如何属性设置。Furthermore, closing a may cause an application to stop running depending on how the property is set. > [!NOTE] > 当一个窗口托管在浏览器中时，不能调用此方法。This method cannot be called when a window is hosted in a browser. ## Examples 下面的示例演示**文件** | **退出**菜单来显式调用。The following example shows a **File** | **Exit** menu being handled to explicitly call . remarks.format: ## Remarks 可进行处理以检测何时关闭窗口 (例如，当称为)。 can be handled to detect when a window is being closed (for example, when is called). 此外，可用于阻止窗口关闭。Furthermore, can be used to prevent a window from closing. 若要阻止关闭窗口，可以设置的属性参数`true`。To prevent a window from closing, you can set the property of the argument to `true`. 引发事件时调用时，如果单击窗口的关闭按钮，或如果用户按下 ALT + F4。The event is raised when is called, if a window's Close button is clicked, or if the user presses ALT+F4. 如果拥有的窗口已打开由其所有者窗口中使用，并且所有者窗口已关闭，拥有的窗口不会引发事件。If an owned window was opened by its owner window using , and the owner window is closed, the owned window's event is not raised. 如果所有者窗口处于关闭状态 (请参阅)，则不会引发上拥有的窗口。If the owner of a window is closed (see ), is not raised on the owned window. 如果调用时，引发的每个窗口事件。If is called, the event for each window is raised. 但是，如果是取消，会忽略取消操作。However, if is canceled, cancellation is ignored. 如果由于用户注销或关闭，会话终止则不会引发; 处理来实现，则取消应用程序关闭的代码。If a session ends because a user logs off or shuts down, is not raised; handle to implement code that cancels application closure. 如果你想要显示和隐藏的应用程序生存期内多个时间窗口，并且不想要包含重新实例化窗口每次您显示，但可以处理事件，取消它，并调用方法。If you want to show and hide a window multiple times during the lifetime of an application, and you don't want to reinstantiate the window each time you show it, you can handle the event, cancel it, and call the method. 然后，可以调用重新打开它的同一实例上。Then, you can call on the same instance to reopen it. ## Examples 下面的示例演示，它确定是否需要用户干预，以关闭。The following example demonstrates a that determines whether it needs user intervention to close. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用的代码中显示一个对话框，以确定用户是否接受 (`true`) 或已取消 (`false`) 对话框。 can be used from the code that showed a dialog box to determine whether a user accepted (`true`) or canceled (`false`) the dialog box. 如果已接受对话框中，这表示到打开对话框以检索用户已收集的数据，并对其进行处理的代码。If a dialog box was accepted, this signifies to the code that opened the dialog box to retrieve the data that was collected by the user and process it. 如果对话框已被取消，但是，这表示调用的代码应停止任何进一步的处理。If a dialog box was canceled, however, this signifies that calling code should stop any further processing. 默认情况下，当用户执行下列任一取消对话框中：By default, a dialog box is canceled when a user does one of the following: - PressesALT + F4。PressesALT+F4. - 单击**关闭**按钮。Clicks the **Close** button. - 选择**关闭**从系统菜单。Selects **Close** from the System menu. 在这些情况下，所有是`false`默认情况下。In all of these cases, is `false` by default. 对话框通常提供一个特殊的按钮来取消对话框中，这是其属性设置为`true`。A dialog box typically provides a special button to cancel a dialog, which is the button whose property is set to `true`. 或者它按下时，或按下了 ESC 键时，这种方式配置一个按钮将自动关闭窗口。A button configured this way will automatically close a window when either it is pressed, or when the ESC key is pressed. 在这些情况下，任一保持`false`。In either of these cases, remains `false`. 对话框通常还会提供一个接受按钮，这是按钮其属性设置为`true`。A dialog box also typically provides an accept button, which is the button whose property is set to `true`. 这种方式配置一个按钮将引发其它或 ENTER 键被按下时的事件。A button configured this way will raise its event when either it or the ENTER key is pressed. 但是，它不会自动关闭对话框中，也无法将它设置到`true`。However, it won't automatically close the dialog box, nor will it set to `true`. 您需要手动编写此代码中，通常从默认按钮的事件处理程序。You need to manually write this code, usually from the event handler for the default button. 是`null`时显示的对话框但不接受或已取消。 is `null` when the dialog box is shown but neither accepted nor canceled. 在对话框关闭后，可以从返回的值来获取对话框结果方法，或通过检查属性。After a dialog box closes, you can get the dialog result from the value returned by method, or by inspecting the property. 仅可设置何时打开通过调用其方法。 can only be set when a is opened by calling its method. > [!NOTE] > 不能设置或获取此属性，当一个窗口托管在浏览器中时。You cannot set or get this property when a window is hosted in a browser. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何配置确定按钮和取消按钮以返回相应。The following example shows how to configure an OK button and a Cancel button to return the appropriate . [!code-xaml[WindowDialogResultSnippets#WindowDialogResultXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowDialogResultSnippets/CSharp/DialogBox.xaml#windowdialogresultxaml)] [!code-csharp[WindowDialogResultSnippets#WindowDialogResultCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowDialogResultSnippets/CSharp/DialogBox.xaml.cs#windowdialogresultcodebehind)] [!code-vb[WindowDialogResultSnippets#WindowDialogResultCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowDialogResultSnippets/visualbasic/dialogbox.xaml.vb#windowdialogresultcodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当其处于隐藏状态，未关闭窗口以及两者都也不引发事件。A window is not closed when it is hidden, and neither the nor event is raised. 相反，在窗口属性设置为。Instead, the window's property is set to . 如果窗口是应用程序的和应用程序的是，应用程序不会关闭。If a window is the application's and the application's is , the application does not shut down. 同样，应用程序不会关闭如果窗口是唯一的窗口，并且应用程序的关闭模式是。Likewise, the application does not shut down if a window is the only window and the application's shutdown mode is . 如果你想要显示和隐藏的应用程序生存期内多个时间窗口，并且不想每次重新实例化窗口则显示它，可以处理事件，取消它，并调用方法。If you want to show and hide a window multiple times during the lifetime of an application, and you don't want to re-instantiate the window each time you show it, you can handle the event, cancel it, and call the method. 然后，可以调用以重新打开它的同一实例上。Then, you can call on the same instance to re-open it.

summary.span: 获取或设置窗口的图标。

span.span: Gets or sets a window's icon.

value.span: 一个表示图标的 对象。

span.span: An object that represents the icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 独立应用程序有两种类型的图标：Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) standalone applications have two types of icons: - 一个程序集图标，通过使用指定``属性在应用程序的项目中生成文件。One assembly icon, which is specified by using the `` property in the application's project build file. 此图标用作程序集的桌面图标。This icon is used as the desktop icon for an assembly. > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Studio 中调试时，可能不会由于宿主进程中显示您的图标。When debugging in Visual Studio, your icon may not appear due to the hosting process. 如果你运行可执行文件，则将显示图标。If you run the executable, the icon will appear. 有关详细信息，请参阅[托管进程 (vshost.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c6b9e2be-f18d-4d75-ac52-56d55784734b)。For more information, see [Hosting Process (vshost.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c6b9e2be-f18d-4d75-ac52-56d55784734b). - 每个指定的设置窗口的一个图标。One icon per window that is specified by setting . 为每个窗口标题栏，任务栏按钮中和其 ALT TAB 应用程序选择列表项中使用此图标。For each window, this icon is used in its title bar, its task bar button, and in its ALT-TAB application selection list entry. WPF 窗口始终显示的图标。A WPF window always displays an icon. 当未提供通过设置，WPF 选择要显示的图标根据以下规则：When one is not provided by setting , WPF chooses an icon to display based on the following rules: 1. 如果指定，则使用程序集图标。Use the assembly icon, if specified. 2. 如果未指定的程序集图标，则使用默认的 Microsoft Windows 图标。If the assembly icon is not specified, use the default Microsoft Windows icon. 如果您使用若要指定自定义窗口图标，可以还原默认应用程序图标通过设置到`null`。If you use to specify a custom window icon, you can restore the default application icon by setting to `null`. 可在多种方式在 Windows，包括一个窗口，窗口中，ALT + TAB 文件选择列表的任务栏的标题栏中显示的图标。A single icon can be used in a variety of ways in Windows, including being shown in the title bar of a window, the task bar for a window, the ALT+TAB file selection list. 其中每项显示了使用不同的大小; 的图标16 x 16 像素的图标显示在窗口的标题栏和在任务栏中，虽然 32 x 32 像素的图标显示在 ALT + TAB 文件选择列表中。Each of these shows the icon using a different size; a 16x16 pixel icon is displayed in the title bar of a window and in the task bar, while a 32x32 pixel icon is displayed in the ALT+TAB file selection list. 某些应用程序，如[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)]，提供**视图**菜单中，您可以选择你想要查看的图标的大小。Some applications, like [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)], provide a **View** menu that allows you to choose the size of the icon you'd like to view. 以适应不同的显示大小，其中每个表示版本的面向特定的大小和颜色深度的图标的一个或多个实际图标的组成一个图标文件。To cater to the various display sizes, an icon file is composed of one or more actual icons where each one represents a version of the icon that targets a specific size and color depth. 例如，一个图标只能有一个单个 16 x 16 像素图标具有 16 种颜色，而另一个可能包含 16 x 16 像素和 16 种颜色和 256 种颜色的 32 x 32 像素图标。For example, one icon may only have a single 16x16 pixel icon with 16 colors, while another may contain 16x16 pixel and 32x32 pixel icons with both 16 colors and 256 colors. 如果所有可能的大小和颜色深度的图标存在于一个图标文件内,将使用相应的图标。If icons for all possible sizes and color depths exist within an icon file, will use the appropriate icon. 如果一个图标文件仅包含一部分的所有可能的图标，降低大小和颜色深度的顺序使用下一步最适当的图标。If an icon file contains only a subset of all the possible icons, uses the next most appropriate icon in order of decreasing sizes and color depth. 结果是通过将始终使用的图标，但使用的图标可能不将目标所需的大小和颜色深度。The result is that an icon will always be used by , although the icon used may not target the required size and color depth. 例如，具有 16 种颜色 16 x 16 像素的图标还可能用于进行显示，为 32 x 32 像素图标具有 256 种颜色。For example, a 16x16 pixel icon with 16 colors may be used for display as a 32x32 pixel icon with 256 colors. 这可能会导致不需要的视觉效果，如像素化，但可避免通过创建所有目标的大小和颜色深度的图标。This can cause undesirable visual effects, such as pixilation, but may be avoided by creating icons for all targeted sizes and color depths. > [!NOTE] > 不能设置或获取此属性，当一个窗口托管在浏览器中时。You cannot set or get this property when a window is hosted in a browser. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置窗口图标。The following example shows how to set a window icon. [!code-xaml[WindowIconSnippets#WindowIconSetXAML](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowIconSnippets/XAML/MainWindow.xaml#windowiconsetxaml)] [!code-csharp[WindowIconSnippets#SetWindowIconInCode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowIconSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#setwindowiconincode)] [!code-vb[WindowIconSnippets#SetWindowIconInCode](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowIconSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#setwindowiconincode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过调用由父窗口打开的子窗口时，父级和子级窗口间建立的隐式关系。When a child window is opened by a parent window by calling , an implicit relationship is established between both parent and child window. 此关系强制实施某些行为，包括相对于最小化、 最大化和还原。This relationship enforces certain behaviors, including with respect to minimizing, maximizing, and restoring. 通过调用由父窗口创建子窗口时，但是，子窗口不具有与父窗口之间的关系。When a child window is created by a parent window by calling , however, the child window does not have a relationship with the parent window. 这表示：This means that: - 子窗口没有对父窗口的引用。The child window does not have a reference to the parent window. - 子窗口的行为不依赖于父窗口; 的行为这两个窗口可以覆盖另一个，或最小化、 最大化，并且独立于其他恢复。The behavior of the child window is not dependent on the behavior of the parent window; either window can cover the other, or be minimized, maximized, and restored independently of the other. 若要允许你创建的子窗口和父窗口，之间的关系支持所有权这一概念。To allow you to create a relationship between a child window and a parent window, supports the notion of ownership. 建立所有权时窗口 （拥有窗口） 的属性设置为另一个窗口 （所有者窗口） 的引用。Ownership is established when the property of a window (the owned window) is set with a reference to another window (the owner window). 建立这种关系后，会展现的以下行为：Once this relationship is established, the following behaviors are exhibited: - 如果所有者窗口最小化，其拥有的所有 windows 最小都化也。If an owner window is minimized, all its owned windows are minimized as well. - 如果拥有的窗口最小化，其所有者不降到最低。If an owned window is minimized, its owner is not minimized. - 如果所有者窗口最大化时，将还原所有者窗口和其所拥有的 windows。If an owner window is maximized, both the owner window and its owned windows are restored. - 所有者窗口绝不会覆盖所拥有的窗口。An owner window can never cover an owned window. - 拥有不是使用 windows不是模式对话框。Owned windows that were not opened using are not modal. 用户仍可以与所有者窗口进行交互。The user can still interact with the owner window. - 如果关闭所有者窗口，其拥有的 windows 也将关闭。If you close an owner window, its owned windows are also closed. - 如果拥有的窗口已打开由其所有者窗口中使用，并且所有者窗口已关闭，拥有的窗口不会引发事件。If an owned window was opened by its owner window using , and the owner window is closed, the owned window's event is not raised. 当通过调用打开的子窗口，还应设置子窗口的属性。When you open a child window by calling , you should also set the property of the child window. 如果不这样做，用户无法再通过按任务栏按钮还原子窗口和父窗口。If you don't, then your users won't be able to restore both child window and parent window by pressing the task bar button. 相反，按任务栏按钮会产生一系列 windows，包括子和父窗口中的，为他们选择;还原仅所选的窗口。Instead, pressing the task bar button will yield a list of windows, including both child and parent window, for them to select; only the selected window is restored. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您还应设置属性窗口中，打开通过调用以确保使用正确的行为。You should also set the property on a window that that is opened by calling to ensure correct behavior with . > [!NOTE] > 不能设置或获取此属性，当一个窗口托管在浏览器中时。You cannot set or get this property when a window is hosted in a browser. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何建立所有者/所拥有的关系。The following example shows how to establish the owner/owned relationship. [!code-csharp[WindowOwnerOwnedWindowsSnippets#SetWindowOwnerCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowOwnerOwnedWindowsSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#setwindowownercode)] [!code-vb[WindowOwnerOwnedWindowsSnippets#SetWindowOwnerCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowOwnerOwnedWindowsSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#setwindowownercode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有四个选项：There are four options: - **NoResize**。**NoResize**. 用户不能调整窗口的大小。The user cannot resize the window. 最大化和最小化框不会显示。The Maximize and Minimize boxes are not shown. - **CanMinimize**。**CanMinimize**. 用户只能最小化窗口和从任务栏中还原它。The user can only minimize the window and restore it from the taskbar. 同时显示了最小化和最大化框，但只有最小化框处于启用状态。The Minimize and Maximize boxes are both shown, but only the Minimize box is enabled. - **CanResize**。**CanResize**. 用户必须在窗口上四处使用最小化和最大化框中，并可拖动大纲调整窗口的大小的完整功能。The user has the full ability to resize the window, using the Minimize and Maximize boxes, and a draggable outline around the window. 最小化和最大化框显示并启用。The Minimize and Maximize boxes are shown and enabled. （默认值）。(Default). - **CanResizeWithGrip**。**CanResizeWithGrip**. 此选项具有相同的功能，但将"重设大小手柄"添加到窗口的右下角。This option has the same functionality as , but adds a "resize grip" to the lower right corner of the window. > [!NOTE] > 不能设置或获取此属性，当一个窗口托管在浏览器中时。You cannot set or get this property when a window is hosted in a browser. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 还原矩形是之前它是已最小化还是最大化窗口所占据的区域。The restore rectangle is the region occupied by the window before it was minimized or maximized. 可以使用保存的最后一个大小和窗口的位置之前关闭应用程序，并在下次启动应用程序可将窗口还原为用户保留它的方式检索这些值。You can use to save the last size and location of a window before an application is closed, and retrieve those values the next time an application starts to restore a window to the way a user left it. 如果您查询显示窗口之前或之后已关闭，返回。If you query before the window has been shown or after it has been closed, is returned. > [!NOTE] > 当一个窗口托管在浏览器中时，无法获取此属性。You cannot get this property when a window is hosted in a browser. ## Examples 下面的示例使用和独立存储来确保的大小和窗口的位置相同就像窗口显示上一次。The following example uses and isolated storage to ensure the size and location of a window are the same as they were the previous time the window was shown. [!code-xaml[WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets#WindowRestoreBoundsXAML1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml#windowrestoreboundsxaml1)] [!code-xaml[WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets#WindowRestoreBoundsXAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml#windowrestoreboundsxaml2)] [!code-csharp[WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets#WindowRestoreBoundsCODEBEHIND1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#windowrestoreboundscodebehind1)] [!code-vb[WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets#WindowRestoreBoundsCODEBEHIND1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#windowrestoreboundscodebehind1)] [!code-csharp[WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets#WindowRestoreBoundsCODEBEHIND2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#windowrestoreboundscodebehind2)] [!code-vb[WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets#WindowRestoreBoundsCODEBEHIND2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#windowrestoreboundscodebehind2)]

summary.span: 打开窗口并返回，而不等待新打开的窗口关闭。

span.span: Opens a window and returns without waiting for the newly opened window to close.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当实例化类，它不是默认情况下可见。When the class is instantiated, it is not visible by default. 显示一个窗口，并立即返回，而不等待窗口即将关闭。 shows a window and returns immediately, without waiting for the window to be closed. 因此，打开的窗口不会阻止用户与其他 windows 应用程序中进行交互。Consequently, the opened window does not prevent users from interacting with other windows in the application. 此类型的窗口称为*无模式*窗口。This type of window is called a *modeless* window. 无模式窗口的常见示例是属性窗口、 工具箱和调色板。Common examples of modeless windows are properties windows, toolboxes, and palettes. 若要限制用户与特定窗口进行交互，窗口必须打开通过调用。To restrict a user to interacting with a specific window, the window must be opened by calling . 通过调用打开的窗口does 不会自动具有与打开的窗口之间的关系; 具体而言，打开的窗口不知道哪个窗口打开它。A window that is opened by calling does not automatically have a relationship with the window that opened it; specifically, the opened window does not know which window opened it. 可以使用建立这种关系属性并托管使用属性。This relationship can be established using the property and managed using the property. 调用实现作为设置相同的最终结果的属性对象传递给。Calling achieves the same end result as setting property of the object to . 但是，没有从时间角度来看这两者之间的区别。However, there is a difference between the two from a timing perspective. 调用是一个同步操作，之后才会返回引发上子窗口的事件：Calling is a synchronous operation that returns only after the event on the child window has been raised: [!code-csharp[WindowShowTimingSnippets#ShowSync](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowTimingSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#showsync)] [!code-vb[WindowShowTimingSnippets#ShowSync](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowTimingSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#showsync)] 设置，但是，将立即返回的异步操作：Setting , however, is an asynchronous operation that returns immediately: [!code-csharp[WindowShowTimingSnippets#ShowASync](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowTimingSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#showasync)] [!code-vb[WindowShowTimingSnippets#ShowASync](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowTimingSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#showasync)] 设置时，然后才能设置注册的任何窗口事件可能不会在其中设置方法之后直到引发已完成执行。When setting , any window events you register before you set may not be raised until after the method in which you set has completed execution. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何打开无模式窗口。The following sample demonstrates how to open a modeless window. [!code-csharp[WindowShowSnippets#WindowShowCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#windowshowcode)] [!code-vb[WindowShowSnippets#WindowShowCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#windowshowcode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当与窗口及其属性设置为`false`是打开，不会激活窗口并将其直到用户手动激活选择该窗口不会引发事件。When a window with its property set to `false` is opened, the window is not activated and its event is not raised until a user manually activates the window by selecting it. 所选的窗口后，其激活，并通常将停用。After the window is selected, it activates and deactivates normally. 若要防止窗口在打开时激活属性必须设置为`false`显示窗口之前 (通过调用); 设置到`false`窗口显示不起作用后。To prevent a window from being activated when it opens, the property must be set to `false` before the window is shown (by calling ); setting to `false` after a window is shown has no effect. 设置到`false`通过调用以模式方式打开的窗口上，没有实际影响。Setting to `false` on a window that is opened modally, by calling , has no real impact. 尽管未将激活模式窗口，但模式窗口将阻止用户激活任何其他打开的应用程序窗口。Although the modal window will not be activated, the modal window will prevent the user from activating any other open application windows. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用标记来配置不被激活的情况下打开的窗口。The following example shows how to use markup to configure a window to be opened without being activated. [!code-xaml[WindowShowActivatedSnippets#ShowUnactivatedMARKUP1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowActivatedSnippets/CSharp/AWindow.xaml#showunactivatedmarkup1)] [!code-csharp[WindowShowActivatedSnippets#ShowUnactivatedCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowActivatedSnippets/CSharp/AWindow.xaml.cs#showunactivatedcodebehind)] [!code-vb[WindowShowActivatedSnippets#ShowUnactivatedCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowActivatedSnippets/visualbasic/awindow.xaml.vb#showunactivatedcodebehind)] 下面的示例演示如何使用代码来配置在窗口中打开，也不被激活它。The following example shows how to use code to configure a window to be opened without it being activated. [!code-csharp[WindowShowActivatedSnippets#ShowUnactivatedWindowCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowActivatedSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#showunactivatedwindowcode)] [!code-vb[WindowShowActivatedSnippets#ShowUnactivatedWindowCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowActivatedSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#showunactivatedwindowcode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当实例化类，它不是默认情况下可见。When a class is instantiated, it is not visible by default. 显示的窗口、 禁用应用程序中的所有其他窗口和仅在窗口关闭时返回。 shows the window, disables all other windows in the application, and returns only when the window is closed. 此类型的窗口被称为*模式*窗口。This type of window is known as a *modal* window. 模式窗口主要用作对话框。Modal windows are primarily used as dialog boxes. 对话框是窗口的一种特殊类型的应用程序使用与完成任务，例如打开文件或打印文档的用户进行交互。A dialog box is a special type of window that applications use to interact with users to complete tasks, such as opening files or printing documents. 对话框通常允许用户在接受或取消它们已为其显示在对话框关闭前的任务。Dialog boxes commonly allow users to accept or cancel the task for which they were shown before the dialog box is closed. 返回值，该值指定是否接受或取消活动。 returns a value that specifies whether the activity was accepted or canceled. 返回值是 属性在窗口关闭前具有的值。The return value is the value of the property before a window closes. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 通过调用打开的窗口方法不会自动具有与打开的窗口之间的关系; 具体而言，打开的窗口不知道哪个窗口打开它。A window that is opened by calling the method does not automatically have a relationship with the window that opened it; specifically, the opened window does not know which window opened it. 可以使用建立这种关系属性并托管使用属性。This relationship can be established using the property and managed using the property. 若要支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]自动化 (请参阅[UI 自动化概述](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-overview.md))，必须为通过调用打开的窗口设置。To support [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] automation (see [UI Automation Overview](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-overview.md)), must be set for a window opened by calling . 当模式[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]窗口 (通过调用打开一个窗口) 已关闭，以前已激活窗口重新激活。When a modal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] window (a window opened by calling ) is closed, the previously activated window is reactivated. 如果在安装结束时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]窗口具有所有者窗口 (请参阅)，不是所有者窗口重新激活时模式[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]窗口处于关闭状态，除非它是之前激活的窗口。If a modal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] window has an owner window (see ), the owner window is not reactivated when the modal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] window is closed unless it was the previously activated window. > [!NOTE] > 当一个窗口托管在浏览器中时，不能调用此方法。This method cannot be called when a window is hosted in a browser. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何打开一个模式窗口。The following sample demonstrates how to open a modal window. [!code-csharp[WindowShowDialogSnippets#WindowShowDialogCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowDialogSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#windowshowdialogcode)] [!code-vb[WindowShowDialogSnippets#WindowShowDialogCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowDialogSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#windowshowdialogcode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为，设置或不起作用; 可以设置这两个属性，但使用设置的值不会应用到窗口。When is set to , setting either or has no effect; both properties can be set, but the values they are set with are not applied to the window. 当设置为，并设置不会更改窗口的高度。When is set to , setting does not change the height of the window. 当设置为，并设置不会更改窗口的宽度。When is set to , setting does not change the width of the window. 如果而不具有值:If has a value other than : - 将自动设置为如果用户通过使用重设大小手柄或拖动边框来调整窗口大小时。 is automatically set to if a user resizes the window by using the resize grip or dragging the border. - 如果内容的大小发生更改，将使窗口自行调整大小，采用了引发。If the size of the content changes in a way that causes the window to resize itself, is raised. 如果窗口是透明 (请参阅)，则应考虑设置到以确保窗口是不能大于其可见内容。If a window is transparent (see ), you should consider setting to to ensure the window is no larger than its visible content. > [!NOTE] > 不能设置或获取此属性，当一个窗口托管在浏览器中时。You cannot set or get this property when a window is hosted in a browser. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置代码以指定如何调整窗口大小以适应其内容中的属性。The following example shows how to set the property in code to specify how a window resizes to fit its content. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置`WindowStartupLocation`属性设置为会打开一个窗口来定位根据其和属性值。Setting the `WindowStartupLocation` property to causes a window to be positioned according to its and property values. 如果任一或属性均未指定，其值均由 Windows。If either the or properties aren't specified, their values are determined by Windows. 设置`WindowStartupLocation`属性设置为会打开一个窗口定位在屏幕，其中包含鼠标光标的中心。Setting the `WindowStartupLocation` property to causes a window to be positioned in the center of the screen that contains the mouse cursor. 设置`WindowStartupLocation`属性设置为会打开一个窗口定位在其所有者窗口的中心 (请参阅)，如果指定。Setting the `WindowStartupLocation` property to causes a window to be positioned in the center of its owner window (see ), if specified. 所有者窗口可以是另一个 WPF 窗口或非 WPF 窗口。The owner window can be either another WPF window or a non-WPF window. > [!NOTE] > 有关与非 WPF 窗口的 WPF 窗口的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 和 Win32 互操作](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md)和。For more information about WPF windows with non-WPF windows, see [WPF and Win32 Interoperation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md) and . 如果未指定所有者窗口，窗口的位置由相同的方式如同`WindowStartupLocation`属性设置为。If an owner window is not specified, the position of the window is determined in the same way as if the `WindowStartupLocation` property is set to . > [!NOTE] > 不能设置或获取此属性的值，当一个窗口托管在浏览器中时。You cannot set or get the value of this property when a window is hosted in a browser.
